answerText: Rydberg formula[10] By putting in 2 for the first integer and using integers greater than two for the second in the Rydberg formula, one can get the Ballmer series of spectra for this atom.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Alabama + Yale C + Alberta | 8 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this equation which states that one divided by the lambda is equal to a constant times the difference of reciprocals the squares of two integers n sub 1 and n sub 2.
